Text: You decide to head to bed. You've toiled enough for one night.
You lie down and close your eyes.
After hours of staring into the blue light of your monitor, keeping your eyelids shut almost stings.
You try not to compare yourself to Joselyn, and you try to sleep.
Just as you're about to drift off, you hear footsteps approaching your door.
A message from Joselyn, saying that she won't be home tonight.
